snippet.title: Xion Leak - 1st trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948490/Xion_Leak/

Play as two freshly assembled robots having to flee a terrible escape from Xion; this extremely corrosive gas that destroys everything in its path. Flee before the gas fries your precious circuits! Your allies the Babybots  are a bit silly but they will be of great help to you, and the mysterious Foreman will make sure to guide you into the factory he knows like the back of his hand.
